TopicTitle: [1.0.x] Procedural Parts Textures | Procedural KW - June 8

Articles.Content: Ooooh sorry I read things too quickly lol, didn't see that. Well, I hope you release them soon, I really use ProcFairings on pretty much everything I can.

Looking good can't wait !!!

EDIT And blackheart612 what are those booster from ?
You mean on my Titan? It's from StretchySRB with my white nozzle textures
blackheart612 is there away to add a big flag holder on the fairings ?
blackheart612: very nice indeed! Totally gonna use those in RftS.

well, FASA adds a place-able flag to your ship, you can try that. but it is possible with out that, by texturing a fairing and putting it in the other side and putting another default texture fairing on the other side

For example, the craft on the OP has asymmetric fairing design:
So, any ETA's on the fairings?
Hmmm, how about making the KW Expanded Fairing Bases into ProcFairings fairing bases? That would be swell.

I'm really not into ETA's but maybe not before the end of the month because... you know, I'm doing other stuff such as RL and Squad Re-tex

I'll try adding the expanded fairings immediately to test it

Edit, there's a problem on fairing base and just realized on my mind that why use an expanded base when the fairing itself is expandable?

Edited February 10, 2014 by blackheart612
So that you can have it look like conic on the bottom and egg-shaped on the top, maybe

So blackheart the fairings in this mod are not available yet? Just the tank textures

? I forgot to try those out last night, but as for the fairings.. I.couldn't find them.

Like... this?

You know, I'm a little busy thinking of the procfairings.

I got a couple of textures, got a couple of shapes, but textures+shapes+new textures on new shapes = super crowded aerodynamics tab. I'm trying to learn firespitter texture changer for this. (Cause I am a noob at that, let me just seek help for a moment or later)

Can't you just clone the CFG or something from one of the StretchySRB/StretchyTank's cfg file and put it as the fairings cfg (I mean the module of the CFG, excuse me for my non-expertise on anything at all and dumbness if it's not possible)?

Afaik, that's a feature coming on PFairings, I'm not that good at cfg editing either but I don't see a texture changer module except firespitter. If I want it to be like stretchySRBs, I need to learn Firespitter texture changer. Which will come. Trust me, I don't know it yet but I will try my best to integrate it. I don't want to crowd your guys' Tabs (that's why I didn't release it yet)

But if Nathan creates a module that uses model changer (like cones) and texture changer (or tells me if there is already), then I'd use it. I'd go around asking when I got time.
I am having trouble making this work. I simply drop the blackheart folder into game data, but no new fairing or tank textures are showing up....

I am having trouble making this work. I simply drop the blackheart folder into game data, but no new fairing or tank textures are showing up....

Yes. I am experiencing the same. I'm not trying to rush you blackheart. I love the work your doing here. Do what you gotta do. I just wanna know one thing... The download you posted in the OP.. what's in it? And how do we get these textures to show up? Because as is all I have is the "stock" stretchy textures when cycling through them with the T key. Nothing more.

Yeah and with the KW fairings, I get the faring bases but no KW fairing itself

Edit:Actually have you just not added the textures yet?

Edited February 10, 2014 by Boamere

To all of those who are asking where the fairings are; he said he was working on them like, 5 posts ago.

Edited February 10, 2014 by Andrezado

Do you have ProcFairings/StretchySRB installed?

Also there is no new fairings yet as said in OP but there are KW fairing bases/interstage bases. They have the same look as a KW so don't overlook them.

I see when you rename the files them your normal maps and such disappear from them. Use the Model{} things "texture" component to get that working again. refer to how Kosmos has different names for files to achieve this.
Opps forget your license? Looks like download got removed

I was able to get rthe textures and bases to work, but not the SRB nozzle. It's still the stock stretchy SRB. Is it a part? Im not trying to segment srbs like you did in the picture. ( are they just all fuel tanks with the last one being solid for the look? ) but I would like that nozzle.

Edited February 12, 2014 by Motokid600

I see when you rename the files them your normal maps and such disappear from them. Use the Model{} things "texture" component to get that working again. refer to how Kosmos has different names for files to achieve this.

Thanks for the tip, I'll keep that in mind.

Edit: Wait, you meant on the Stretchy textures or KW PFairing?

Opps forget your license? Looks like download got removed

Link removed because I overlooked some licensing with the Kosmos team. Apologies to everyone, it was my fault. We settled the issue and I am allowed to use them now. I'm grateful to CBBP right there.

Edited February 12, 2014 by blackheart612

Link removed because I overlooked some licensing with the Kosmos team. Apologies to everyone, it was my fault. We settled the issue and I am allowed to use them now. I'm grateful to CBBP right there.

Ah okay

I was able to get rthe textures and bases to work, but not the SRB nozzle. It's still the stock stretchy SRB. Is it a part? Im not trying to segment srbs like you did in the picture. ( are they just all fuel tanks with the last one being solid for the look? ) but I would like that nozzle.

Yep, they are all piled up Structural fuselages with an SRB down there. I'm planning to add the whole texture whenever I find time.

To install the white nozzle, you just need to copy the GameData itself on the root folder (I accidentally packaged the StretchySRB dll there, Imma fix that real soon)
